title.newValue: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop

description.newValue:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinkingâ€”co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-loop
